long_description: it's about setting personal goals and smashing them. it's about pushing your limits to defeat the world's best obstacles. it's about teamwork and friendship. it's about the amazing people you will meet on the course. it's about creating the memory of a lifetime. a unique take on your conventional 8 foot wall. once you've scaled the front side of colossus, there's only one way down. this isn't your average heavy object carry. hands and knees, that is. you can't miss this blue mammoth with it's unique design. it's time to start taking cold showers. from stories to news to training find the latest on all things savage. learn more about our mud runs today. colossus is the prized jewel of savage race. find your rhythm and enjoy the ride. get yourself over this obstacle and you're on your way to completing savage race. one spectator pass is included. sam abbitt's interest in obstacle racing, fitness and endurance sports is what drove him to create savage race. having lived for several years in lake tahoe, california, lloyd has a passion for traveling, snowboarding and outdoor recreation.

generated_description: savage race, legally known as mad cap events llc, is a company based in anderson county, tennessee, specializing in extreme mud obstacle races. the company organizes a variety of mud runs and obstacle courses, featuring 25 unique obstacles designed to test participants' physical and mental endurance. each event includes rfid chip timing, medals, and other race-related items. savage race also offers a loyalty program called savage syndicate, which rewards participants who complete multiple races within a year. the company is known for its high-quality obstacles and challenging courses, attracting participants from various age groups and skill levels.
